blogs.title: The Joy OF Childhood
blogs.author: Damilola Omolaju
blogs.body: lorem ispum et ammet de cancer

blogs.title: the joy of childhood
blogs.body:
one picture a thousand words
little feet cant keep off the mud
in the happiness of their own world


amidst the algae and fungi
and their grumbling stomach due to hunger
they run helter-skelter
with innocence and laughter
blogs.author: betty's lines
